items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit was perfect
items.body: Size is good, comfortable and good quality Read more
items.author: Unknown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty
items.body: This dress is gorgeous! The material is great quality and the color is vibrant. I listened to other reviews and sized up, but I wish I wouldn't have. It fits very true to size in my opinion and I'll have to exchange for the smaller size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Awful smell
items.body: The dress has an awful smell. I have been trying to air it out for a week. I have washed it and also used poof on it. The fit was good. If I could just get passed the smell. Read more
items.author: Linda Saults

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super soft dress, length isn't the most flattering on me
items.body: This dress is so soft and comfortable! It'll definitely keep you warm on a slightly chilly fall or winter night. It's a little shapeless, but nothing that a belt can't fix. I normally wear a 12/14 dress and my measurements are 42"/35"/42". The dress is pretty stretchy, so the XL fits just fine as expected based on the size chart. I don't know that I'd wear this dress to a holiday party because it kind of reads more victorian nightgown than festive to me. Maybe if it was a full length dress or knee length then it would look better on me, haha. I'm 5'4" and the dress hits me mid-calf. My husband mentioned that it could make a good Mother Gothel cosplay though. :) Read more
items.author: Lorraine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Velvet Dress
items.body: It was a beautiful quality velvet dress. Great for the holidays. Quick delivery. Read more
items.author: chibby

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Elbow length sleeves
items.body: The dress I received does not look as nice as the photos on the product listing. The red velvet fabric felt low quality and was slightly lighter red in person. The dress has a much higher neck line and the sleeves are much shorter than pictured. The sleeves ended strangely right at the elbow, and so it was uncomfortable to have all the bunched up elastic right there, but it also looked bad to pull it up above the elbow. It just looked bad. The neck line was so high that it was hard to get my head through it; far more modest than what they show in the photos. If you’re looking for a long sleeve dress, don’t buy this one. Major disappointment and now I have to do a return. Read more
items.author: We're all worth it!

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits beautifully! Fabric is perfect
items.author: jocelyn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy
items.body: Comfy but looks too much like a nightgown super soft Read more
items.author: Chelsea

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Navy, Burgundy, Peacock Blue, Black, Dark Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
